description: This file defines a Redux slice for managing 'sprints' in a project management application, including state initialization, reducers for creating sprints and setting active sprint, and handling async fetch actions via extraReducers.

methods.name: createSprint
methods.description: Reducer and prepare function for creating a new sprint with generated ID and provided details.

methods.name: setActiveSprint
methods.description: Reducer for setting the currently active sprint by ID.
